# tf.keras.applications.inception_resnet_v2.preprocess_input

``` python
tf.keras.applications.inception_resnet_v2.preprocess_input(x)
```



Defined in [`tensorflow/python/keras/applications/inception_resnet_v2.py`](https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.10/tensorflow/python/keras/applications/inception_resnet_v2.py).

Preprocesses a numpy array encoding a batch of images.

#### Arguments:

* <b>`x`</b>: a 4D numpy array consists of RGB values within [0, 255].


#### Returns:

Preprocessed array.
